phrases: Apparently the sound is not being broadcast through the public system,
Report.
An unidentified flying object has been detected in our airspace.
What are you talking about?
Explain yourself!
No... did my magic beast possess it?
Yes, I created them to gather Noir Fuel Spirit.
That is, uh... a missile?
Is that a live feed?
Hatred breeds more hatred, which is what it feeds on to get bigger.
Hatred breeds more hatred, and it is using that to get bigger.
So what is that creature's objective?
What is the beast's objective?
It will continue until it self-destructs.
Its power grew too large... at this point, it is far beyond the control of my system.
Its power grew too large, far beyond the control of my system.
Once its power is out of control, we cannot do anything to stop it.
Just like what happened to the moon.
We have no way to constrain its out of control power, just like with what happened to the moon.
We can do it!
It is a freaking missile!
It does not look very delicious.
I really do not think we can catch up on our brooms.
There must be something that only we can do as witches!
Knowing that is the work of a magic beast,
It it well worth a shot.
There is no way you can catch up with a launched missile.
The SSS is out of operation.
If you tried to siphon the magic out, you would find the system almost completely depleted.
There is barely any saved up even if you tried to siphon it.
Yeah, and we still have to try!
Man, there is no convincing you.
You do not have a chance on your own, so we will give you a hand.
I will go as well.
We should manage to take you a nice distance if we link our brooms up and give you a push.
If we stick our brooms together and push you, that should get some extra distance.
Sounds good, Constanze?
You are in, right Constanze?
I am finished.
Right, this should get us there!
Metamorphie Westis!
It is like I got a powerup!
Yeah, you can count on me!
There is a news flash about a missile launch or something.
It does not say where it is even heading.
Hey, is this what they are talking about?
Can it be shot down?
Its speed is considerably slower than a common ballistic missile's.
There is a high probability of success.
Its speed is considerably slower than standard ballistic missiles.
There is a high probability of success.
That a mysterious missile just so happens to be flying from us to them?
Do you think they will believe that explanation?
They would not, of course.
This is an accident.
Even if it impacts in their borders, we have no responsibility in the matter.
No matter the circumstances, they should be informed!
The threat is approaching!
Do you intend to give them pretext for a retaliation?
A separate bogie is in pursuit of the flying object.
No, it appears to be smaller.
Witches from Luna Nova!
Is this in real time?
Thank you, Lotte and Sucy.
It was evaded.
I do not know, but magic could do something.
Huh?
But why?
It is speeding up.
That light is providing them with magic.
People's thoughts are being relayed as magic, without a system of any sort.
The people's thoughts are being sent as magic without relying on a system.
I am streaming Akko's video worldwide.
We are using a new method to show them witches the likes of which they have never seen before.
Are not mic performances your specialty?
These two witches are attempting to stop a dangerous monster.
Please let them hear your support.
Damn witches always getting in our way!
Shut down all of the hijacked monitors!
Cancel all the TV programs!
It is pointless to try and stop them now.
With how far its spread, it cannot be unseen.
What could witches possibly do?!
Not to mention children!
Who the hell would believe in them?!
The people are starting to believe.
Those girls are on the front lines.
Prepare to provide them with backup in the event of their failure.
No.
Wow!
Forget about dropping, our magic keeps on going up!
We have to try.
I guess you could call this a dramatic reunion!
Would you share your opinions about the value of witches with me?
Magic was a far greater existence than I gave it credit for.
But there is something I must accomplish after I clean up my messes.
It would not look good if Akko learned how to fly while her teacher still could not.
Geez, what are you even here for if you are not going to encourage me?
I came because of how confidently you invited me, but it appears we will not be seeing the decisive moment.
What?!
You still cannot stop that sound?
Apparently, the sound is not being broadcast through the public system,
and we are unable to pinpoint its origin.
Report.
An unidentified flying object has been detected in our airspace.
What is going on?
It is a missile...
Little Witch Academia
Little Witch Academia
What is that sound?
It is...
What is it?
A missile, perhaps...
A missile?!
Oh no... was it taken over by my magic creature?
Do you mean those square-y things?
Yes, I built it to gather Noir Fuel Spirit.
It is no use, my access is being denied!
Is that a missile?
You watching a live feed?
Hey, hey, are you kidding?
Why did this happen?
The negative emotions exceeded my calculations.
Hatred breeds more hatred, which it feeds on to get bigger.
What is that creature's objective?
To spread hatred even further around the world.
It will continue on this path until it detonates.
What?!
Is not there any way to stop it?
Its power grew too large... at this point, it is far beyond the restraints of my system.
There is nothing we can do.
Once its power is out of control, we cannot do anything to stop it, just like what happened to the moon.
We can do something!
We can stop it!
Hey, Akko, are you blind?
It is a freaking missile!
It does not look very delicious...
I really do not think we could catch up to it on our brooms.
Does that mean you will not do anything?
We have got nine perfectly good witches right here!
There must be something that only we can do as witches!
You have a point.
Knowing that this is the work of a magic creature,
magic may be our only avenue of response.
It is well worth a try.
You all...
It is impossible.
You cannot catch up to a missile once it is launched.
And even if you could, there is not enough magic left to do so.
The SSS is out of operation too.
Even if you siphoned the remaining magic out, you would find the system almost completely depleted.
We still have to try!
Let us go as far we can with the nine of us!
Yeah, the New Nine Witches!
Man, there is just no convincing you.
You do not have a chance on your own, so we will give you a hand.
I will go as well.
Akko and I should be able to catch up on the Shiny Volley.
Amanda, Constanze, Jasminka, Diana!
You can count on us to come too!
I would be too worried if you went alone.
All right, let us do this!
We can take you a nice distance if we stick our brooms together and give you a push.
Sound good, Constanze?
Everyone...
It is too reckless.
You have no idea what might happen.
Croix.
Let us entrust it all to them.
We will help you as well.
We are finished.
Thanks.
Sybilladura Lelladybura!
Okay, this should get us there!
One moment, girls.
Metamorphie Vestesse!
May you be blessed by the Nine Olde Witches.
It is like I got a power-up!
They should protect you with the power of magic.
Professor, thank you!
Of course.
Be careful.
All right!
I am fired up!
Let us go!
Yeah!
Tia Freyre!
We are failures as teachers.
They do not have a chance of making it.
Akko may be able to make something happen.
Do not tell me you expect a miracle.
Akko does not believe in miracles.
However
She is always believed in herself.

Thank you, Jasminka!
Thank you, Constanze!
It is all on you now!
Yeah, you can count on us!

What is that alert for?

A missile?!
Are you serious?
Why?!
Where is it coming from?
It does not even say where it is heading...
What the hell?
What is going on?
Hey, is this what it is talking about?
I am getting it too.
Wait, this is not a missile.
Are those people?
People?
Here are the flying object's current location and trajectory.
It is heading for that country.
Can we intercept it?
Its speed is considerably slower than a common ballistic missile.
There is a high probability of success.
They should be able to detect it any minute now.
Have you contacted the Prime Minister?
He is heading here now.
Do you think we should alert them?
And how do you intend to explain it?
That a mysterious missile just so happened to be fired from us at them?
That is the truth.
And you think they will believe that explanation?
Not a chance.
This was an accident.
Even if it hits inside their territory, we bear no responsibility in the matter.
Hold on!
No matter the circumstances, they should be informed!
This is an imminent threat!
Do you intend to give them pretext for a counterstrike?
What is this?
A separate bogey is in pursuit of the flying object.
What?

Is it an interceptor missile?
Negative.
It appears to be smaller.
Just what is it?!
Displaying on monitor.
Witches?
Miss Kagari?
All right, this is for Akko!
Okay!
Let us do this!
Please, faerie of fire!
Pyro Booster!

Is this in real time?

This is it for us.
The rest is up to you!
Go, Akko!

Cannot you force them down?
These leaks are unacceptable.
It is too late.
I can see it.

Come on, it is like right there!

Number two, approaching!
Ridiculous!
Little Witch Academia
Little Witch Academia

What is going to happen?

I am in!
Me too!
Us too!
Good luck!
You can do it!
Our magic is increasing.
Huh?
Why is that happening?
I am not sure.
However, we should have no trouble flying now.
How can they remain flying?
Their magic should not have lasted this long.
Fuel Spirit?
No, it is not.
They are speeding up.
That light is providing them with magic.
There are more lights appearing.
People's thoughts are being relayed as magic without utilizing any sort of system.
I cannot believe it!
But those girls still believe.
They believe their actions can change people's feelings and surroundings.
I am now streaming the video of Akko and Diana worldwide.
We will use a new method to show them witches the likes of which they have never seen before.
Speak to the world!
Call for their support.
Were not you great at working the mic?

These two witches are attempting to stop a dangerous monster.

but they are fearlessly facing it head-on.
Please let them hear your support!
Please believe in them!
That will become their power!

Our magic!
Damn witches, always getting in our way!
Shut down all of the hijacked monitors!

Are you saying you believe in those witches?
I believe!
I agree with him.
Prime Minister!

Prepare to provide them with backup in the event of their failure.
Very well.
Do you have any objections?

Now, let us watch them until the end.
Wow!

We will catch up in no time.

We did it!
Not yet.

Andrew.
Father.
